*** Long term project *** Remote ****Description:We are seeking an Oracle Database Administrator with strong knowledge of Oracle programming, systems design, database structures, and current database technologies for a Financial Data Warehouse for a working remotely from anywhere in Texas.Responsibilities include:Manage and monitor database performanceDirect programmers and analysts to make system changesReview and correct programsPerform database tuning for improved performanceAssist in planning and developing integrated database systemsEvaluate and incorporate user requests for new data elementsEnsure data integrity and controls redundancyConduct data modelling and prototypingImplement security and recovery proceduresOptimize database search strategies and storageMaintain data dictionary and sets standardsCreate test environments and manages database backupsAssist with disaster recovery proceduresHelp select and install database softwareEnsure compliance with accessibility standardsProvide user support for data retrieval and accessibility issuesRequirements:Yrs Experience6 Experience in Oracle database design, analysis, and performance tuning for a Financial Data Warehouse.6 Experience in Oracle database structures and data analysis6 Experience designing enterprise applications and/or services6 Experience creating technical and functional design documentation6 Experience within software development lifecycle using Agile methodology – (Scrum, for example)6 Experience with multi-tier system/application development – (SOA, Microservices, 3-tier applications, for example)1 Jira experience1 Oracle Certification1 Experience with Financial data warehouse applications and/or database reporting features.Only submit candidates with:Jira experienceOracle CertificationExperience with Financial data warehouse applications and/or database reporting features
